TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyCondition extends System.Windows.Automation.Condition

Docs.summary: Represents a that tests whether a property has a specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty property, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The value to test the property for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `property` parameter cannot be <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.BoundingRectangleProperty>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.PropertyCondition> specifies that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to be found has a control type of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.List>. The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.PropertyCondition> is then used to obtain the list element from a combo box.
[!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#180](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#180)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#180](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#180)]

MemberSignature.Value: public PropertyCondition (System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty property, object value, System.Windows.Automation.PropertyConditionFlags flags);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty property, object value, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.PropertyConditionFlags flags) cil managed

Docs.param: The value to test the property for.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with flags.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.PropertyCondition> to retrieve the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element representing the main form of an application. The form is located by a case-insensitive search for its string identifier.
[!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#110](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#110)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#110](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#110)]

Docs.summary: Gets the flags used for testing the property value.
Gets the property that this condition is testing.
Gets the property value that this condition is testing.
